issues.title: Order #12345 - Packing Process Failed
issues.description: Order packing process failed in the warehouse management system. Multiple system components reported errors during the process.
issues.aiSummary: Order packing process failure occurred due to a cascade of system errors starting with inventory verification. The root cause appears to be a database deadlock during high-concurrency operations.
issues.technicalRca: Database deadlock occurred during simultaneous inventory updates, causing the packing process to fail. This was exacerbated by high system load during peak hours. The deadlock occurred in the inventory_locks table when multiple transactions attempted to acquire exclusive locks on overlapping inventory records. Transaction logs show concurrent attempts to update inventory levels from multiple packing stations.
issues.customerRca: The order processing was temporarily delayed due to high system load during our peak hours. Our warehouse management system detected a resource conflict while processing multiple orders simultaneously. We have already implemented measures to prevent such conflicts and optimize our order processing capacity.

systemLogs.name: Order Received
systemLogs.summary: Order successfully received by the system
systemLogs.details: Order #12345 received with 3 items. Total value: $156.99

systemLogs.name: Inventory Check
systemLogs.details: Database deadlock detected while updating inventory records. Transaction rolled back.

systemLogs.name: Retry Inventory Check
systemLogs.summary: Successfully verified inventory levels on retry
systemLogs.details: Inventory verification completed after retry. All items available.

systemLogs.name: Warehouse Assignment
systemLogs.summary: Order assigned to warehouse for picking
systemLogs.details: Order assigned to Warehouse #3 based on inventory location and load balancing.

systemLogs.name: Picking Process
systemLogs.details: Picking process taking longer than expected due to high warehouse load.

systemLogs.name: Packing Station Assignment
systemLogs.details: No available packing stations found. All stations reporting busy status.

systemLogs.name: System Alert Generated
systemLogs.details: High priority alert generated for warehouse supervisor regarding packing station availability.
